tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE energy_usage_alerts (
  alert_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  device_id UUID,
  alert_type VARCHAR(50),
  alert_timestamp TIMESTAMPTZ,
  energy_usage DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE AlertLogs (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    alert_type VARCHAR(255),
    alert_details TEXT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    device_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (device_id) REFERENCES EnergyUsageData(device_id)
);

CREATE TABLE devices (
    device_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    device_name VARCHAR(255),
    device_type VARCHAR(50),
    location VARCHAR(100),
    energy_usage DECIMAL(10,2)
);

CREATE TABLE alerts (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    device_id INT,
    alert_type VARCHAR(50),
    message TEXT
);
